GANGSTERS.Definition: members of organised groups of criminals

CRYPTOCURRENCY.Definition: a form of currency or money that only exists digitally or electronically

EXTRADITION.Definition: return to the country where he had been accused of doing something illegal

HUNG.Definition: killed by tying a rope around his neck and removing the support from beneath him

STATIONED.Definition: put to some specific place for a military purpose

SCAR.Definition: a lasting effect of sadness and fear

CURTAIL.Definition: stop something before it is finished

UNDERGRADUATE.Definition: a university student who has not yet taken his degree

HELLRAISER.Definition: a person who causes trouble and has bad habits

PARANOID.Definition: experiencing extreme anxiety because he thought that he couldn't trust anybody

PARANOIA.Definition: an unreasonable feeling that other people didn't like him and wanted to harm him

WARN.Definition: make them realise the possible danger

CAMPER TRUCK.Definition: a truck with space for living quarters (bed etc.)

MUST-HAVE.Definition: something that is very important to have

EVIDENTLY.Definition: in a way that is easy to see

SHARES.Definition: equal parts into which a company's value is divided

FAME.Definition: the state of being known by a lot of people

TARGET.Definition: a person at whom an action is directed

HACKERS.Definition: people who use programming skills to get into other people's computer system

BADGE OF HONOUR.Definition: something that shows you have a particular quality

HACKER.Definition: one who uses programming skills to get into other people's computer system

HACK.Definition: get into his computer system by using programming skills

EXTORTED.Definition: had his money taken from him by using illegal methods

CARTEL.Definition: an illegal group of people who control the market of drugs

COMPOUND.Definition: an area with a group of buildings inside

FLED.Definition: escaped from danger by running away

DEPORTATION.Definition: departure of someone from a country because they do not have the legal right to be there

FAKED.Definition: caused something to appear true while it wasn't

MOTELS.Definition: hotels, especially for people travelling by car

SOLICITED.Definition: approached him with an offer of sex in exchange for money

PARODY.Definition: a video with the purpose of making fun of something

CAMPAIGNER.Definition: someone who takes a series of actions in order to achieve a certain goal

ADVOCATE.Definition: someone who speaks in favour of something

DECENTRALISED.Definition: being away from a control centre

ORDER.Definition: a command or request made by an authority

HANG.Definition: kill by tying a rope around the neck and remove the support beneath the feet

SCHEDULED.Definition: it was planned for him to

TRICKS.Definition: acts intended to deceive or fool someone

OUT OF CHARACTER.Definition: not according to his typical behaviour

PIONEER.Definition: one who opens new areas of development

SELF-DESTRUCTIVE.Definition: behaving in a way that was likely to bring harm upon himself

MARTYR.Definition: one who makes great sacrifices in order to support a cause

UNSTABLE.Definition: likely to change behaviour, lacking stability
